data.comment: Today's referee, Kaspar Sjoberg, has blown to start the match.
Throw-in for Sirius close to the penalty box.
In the minute 2, Sirius have been awarded a corner by Kaspar Sjoberg.
Sirius drive upfield and Stefano Vecchia gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Orebro defender.
Stefano Vecchia (Sirius) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 3, Kaspar Sjoberg signals a free kick to Orebro.
Sirius to take a throw-in in Orebro territory.
Goal kick for Orebro at Behrn Arena.
In the minute 6, Nahom Girmai's header is off-target for Sirius.
Kaspar Sjoberg awards Orebro a goal kick.
Kaspar Sjoberg signals a free kick to Orebro in their own half.
In the minute 8, Free kick for Sirius in their own half.
Kaspar Sjoberg awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 10, Orebro are coming forward and Rasmus Karjalainen gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Orebro.
Kaspar Sjoberg signals a Sirius throw-in in Orebro's half.
In the minute 11, Ball safe as Orebro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Orebro have a goal kick.
Can Orebro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sirius's half?
In the minute 13, Orebro are pushing forward but Nahir Besara's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Sirius goal kick.
Orebro awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 15, Throw-in Sirius.
In Orebro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 16, Stefano Vecchia of Sirius gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Orebro at Behrn Arena.
Michael Almeback is booked for the home team.
Throw-in for Sirius in the half of Orebro.
In the minute 18, Sirius's Yukiya Sugita gets in a shot on goal at Behrn Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Ball goes out of play for a Orebro goal kick.
Stefano Vecchia for Sirius drives towards goal at Behrn Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 20, Corner awarded to Sirius.
Sirius's Jamie Roche misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Orebro.
In the minute 21, At Behrn Arena, Orebro are penalized for being offside.
Throw-in for Sirius in the half of Orebro.
Free kick Sirius.
In the minute 22, Orebro have a goal kick.
Kaspar Sjoberg awards Orebro a goal kick.
Yukiya Sugita gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sirius.
In the minute 25, Throw-in high up the field for Sirius in Orebro.
Free kick for Sirius in the half of Orebro.
Sirius push upfield but Kaspar Sjoberg quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 27, Kevin Wright (Orebro) has been given a yellow card and will be suspended from the next match.
Sirius needs to be cautious. Orebro have an attacking throw-in.
Orebro have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Sirius in their own half.
Free kick for Sirius in their own half.
Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 30, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Orebro, Orebro push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Sirius push forward at Behrn Arena and Stefano Vecchia gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Orebro defence.
In the minute 33, Sirius have been awarded a corner by Kaspar Sjoberg.
Sirius's Hjalmar Ekdal gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Orebro defender.
Kaspar Sjoberg signals a free kick to Orebro in their own half.
In the minute 34, Axel Bjornstrom for Sirius has been booked by Kaspar Sjoberg and receives a first yellow card.
Rasmus Karjalainen scores to make it 1-0 at Behrn Arena.
Dennis Collander with an assist there.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Sirius at Behrn Arena.
Kaspar Sjoberg signals a Orebro throw-in in Sirius's half.
Orebro's Simon Amin gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 39, Kaspar Sjoberg awards Sirius a goal kick.
Can Orebro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sirius's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Sirius goal kick.
In the minute 40, Nahom Girmai of Sirius is pulled up for offside.
In Orebro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Orebro to take a throw-in in Sirius territory.
In the minute 44, Kaspar Sjoberg signals a throw-in for Sirius, close to Orebro's area.
Kaspar Sjoberg signals a Sirius throw-in in Orebro's half.
In Orebro, Yukiya Sugita of Sirius is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Sirius.
Free kick for Sirius in their own half.
Kaspar Sjoberg will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Dennis Collander is back on the pitch.
In the minute 45, Adam Hellborg has recovered and rejoins the match in Orebro.
Throw-in for Sirius in the half of Orebro.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Kaspar Sjoberg waits before resuming play because Adam Hellborg for Sirius is still down.
In the minute 45, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Dennis Collander for Orebro who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Orebro.
Orebro make their first substitution with Romain Gall replacing Dennis Collander.
Can Orebro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sirius's half?
In the minute 48, Kaspar Sjoberg blows against Orebro's Rasmus Karjalainen for offside.
Orebro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sirius to take a throw-in in Orebro territory.
In the minute 49, Throw-in Sirius.
Orebro drives forward and Rasmus Karjalainen gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Orebro have been awarded a corner by Kaspar Sjoberg.
In the minute 50, Can Sirius capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Orebro's half?
Corner awarded to Sirius.
In Orebro Sirius drive forward through Stefano Vecchia. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 53, Sirius have been awarded a corner by Kaspar Sjoberg.
Stefano Vecchia of Sirius smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Yukiya Sugita (Sirius) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 53, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Orebro in the half of Sirius.
Goal! Orebro extend their lead to 2-0 through Nahir Besara.
In the minute 56, Nahir Besara (Orebro) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in high up the field for Orebro in Orebro.
Sirius awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 58, Henrik Rydstrom (Sirius) is making a first substitution, with Laorent Shabani replacing Elias Andersson.
Rasmus Karjalainen (Orebro) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 60, Corner awarded to Sirius.
Orebro advance rapidly upfield but Kaspar Sjoberg blows for offside.
Can Orebro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sirius's half?
In the minute 61, Kaspar Sjoberg awards the home team a throw-in.
Kaspar Sjoberg signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
Kaspar Sjoberg signals a throw-in for Sirius, close to Orebro's area.
In the minute 63, Orebro awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Behrn Arena, Karl Larson has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Throw-in for Orebro in their own half.
In the minute 65, Ball safe as Orebro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Orebro at Behrn Arena.
Orebro's Romain Gall breaks free at Behrn Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 65, Sirius have a goal kick.
Sirius are coming forward and Stefano Vecchia gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Orebro.
In the minute 66, The home team replace Michael Almeback with Benjamin Hjertstrand.
Kaspar Sjoberg signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
Can Sirius capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Orebro's half?
In the minute 68, Ball safe as Orebro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Orebro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Orebro to take a throw-in in Sirius territory.
In the minute 70, Orebro's Andreas Skovgaard is on target but unsuccessful.
Orebro have been awarded a corner by Kaspar Sjoberg.
Nahir Besara (Orebro) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 70, Free kick for Sirius in their own half.
Orebro pushes forward through Simon Amin, whose finish on goal is saved.
Goal! Sirius reduce the deficit to 2-1 through Stefano Vecchia.
In the minute 74, Important block from the Orebro defence as Nahom Girmai fires in a strike for Sirius.
Throw-in for Orebro at Behrn Arena.
In the minute 76, Throw-in for Orebro in the half of Sirius.
Erik Bjorndahl is replacing Rasmus Karjalainen for Orebro at Behrn Arena.
Kaspar Sjoberg awards the away team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Sirius.
In the minute 78, Sirius have a dangerous throw-in.
Sirius are in shooting range from this free kick.
Johan Karlsson is replacing Jamie Roche for the away team.
In the minute 80, Corner awarded to Sirius.
Stefano Vecchia of Sirius gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Orebro at Behrn Arena.
In the minute 81, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Orebro drive upfield and Nahir Besara gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Sirius defender.
Stefano Vecchia gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sirius.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Sirius in their own half.
Simon Amin (Orebro) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in Sirius.
In the minute 83, Ball safe as Sirius is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kaspar Sjoberg signals a Sirius throw-in in Orebro's half.
Throw-in for Sirius at Behrn Arena.
Kaspar Sjoberg awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 87, Chibuike Kennedy Igboananike is on a sub for Adam Hellborg for Sirius.
Sirius have been awarded a corner by Kaspar Sjoberg.
In the minute 89, Stefano Vecchia (Sirius) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Sirius awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Orebro Sirius drive forward through Chibuike Kennedy Igboananike. His shot is on target but it's saved.
At Behrn Arena the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Orebro awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match is over. Final score 2-1.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Simon Amin.
Simon Amin, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Ali Hussein is the substitute for Orebro.
